query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ignored_senders (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  sender_email VARCHAR(320) NOT NULL,
  sender_name VARCHAR(255),
  reason TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  sender_email VARCHAR(320) NOT NULL,
  sender_name VARCHAR(255),

  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
